1

Best Affordable Option

The Ordinary Multi-Peptide Serum

Pros
  • Works for all hair types
  • Creates volume
Cons
  • Can get oily
  • Dropper can get messy

You may have seen people rave about this serum on social media, and for good reason. The formula contains a blend of nourishing ingredients like Procapil and Baicapil to promote hair growth, density, and scalp blood flow, which in turn boosts growth.

Size: 2 oz.

Sephora rating: 4/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “I don’t know how many times I’ve raved about The Ordinary’s Multi-Peptide Serum, but it’s up there on my list of hair care faves. My love for this product has even encouraged several friends and family members to turn to it as well just a few weeks of the first time I tried it, I had dozens of baby hairs sprouting all over my scalp. Also, I have a little trick: if I shower in the evening and apply the serum right after, I wake up with more volume at my roots than I know what to do with.”—Carol Lee, ELLE.com associate beauty e-commerce writer

2

Best Growth Supplements

Nutrafol Women Hair Growth Supplement

Pros
  • Visible results
  • Science-backed
Cons
  • Pricey
  • Requires consistency

Sometimes, we need to nourish from within. Nutrafol’s supplements “contain a mixture of antioxidants and collagen from sources such as algae and shark cartilage,” says Dr. Allyson Brockman-Bitterman, a board-certified dermatologist at Schweiger Dermatology Group in Millburn, NJ. These nutrients help encourage hair growth and reduce shedding.

Size: 120 capsules

Amazon rating: 4.2/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “I’ve always had fast-growing and thick hair, but I got a really damaging round of highlights a few years ago. My hair had stopped growing and had tons of breakage, so I decided to try Nutrafol. My hair finally started growing again, but it also helped reduce the amount of hair fall I had and made my hair feel stronger and thicker.”—Katie Berohn, ELLE beauty editor

3

Best for Thinning Hair

BosleyMD Women’s Revive+ Densifying Treatment Foam

Cons
  • Takes time to see results

Apparently, if you increase the amount of time a hair spends in a follicle, the thicker it will be, leading to that fuller look we all crave. This treatment takes a few weeks to see results, so be sure to stay consistent, and you’ll be shocked by how much your hair has transformed.

Size: 2.11 oz.

Amazon rating: 3.9/5 stars

Our expert says: “The Revive+ Densifying Foam is a great way to thicken hair on a cellular level. It improves mitochondrial function in the hair follicles to extend the hair growth cycle.”—Gretchen Friese

4

Best for Shedding

Vegamour GRO Hair Serum

Pros
  • Pleasant scent
  • Color-safe
Cons
  • May take a while to see results

If you dread brushing your hair or showering because of all of the strands that seem to fall during either activity, it might be time to incorporate Vegamour’s serum into your daily routine. One dropper-full of the antioxidant-rich product is all you need to soothe your scalp, reduce breakage, and slow down that awful shedding.

Size: 1 fl. oz.

Amazon rating: 4/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I am in my early 40s. My temple area on both sides has started to thin, becoming almost embarrassing if I wear a ponytail up or my hair pulled back in a bun. I have tried so many different products—topical and oral. This [is] the only product that actually works. I actually have had my hair start to grow back in the desired areas, which have been my two main areas of focus. I love this product because it is not oily like the other topical products out there. I can actually use this in the AM before work, brush it through my hair, like I normally would brush my hair, and it does not make my [hair] look greasy or oily. Nor does it make me break out.”

It leaves a soothing feeling.”

Then, you can shampoo it off, revealing a nourished scalp and strengthened strands. Amazon rating: 4.6/5 stars

This has helped restore my hair back to what it felt and looked like when I was a teenager.”

Meet the Experts

How long should you use a hair thickening product to see if it actually works?

First, follow the directions on the box or bottle and apply the formula regularly. “With consistent use, you will generally see results in 3-6 months. Consistency is key!” emphasizes Friese.

What are some other ways you can encourage hair thickening?

Beauty starts from within, which is why you need a well-rounded approach. Pay attention to what you’re putting into your body because that will ultimately have a huge impact on the appearance and thickness of your hair. “A healthy diet is key to healthy hair growth. Making sure to eat healthy fats and antioxidants is crucial,” says Friese.

A trip to the doctor might also be in order if you’re really concerned. “Dermatologists also prescribe oral medications that help with hair growth. Finasteride or Propecia has been shown to improve male pattern hair loss by blocking androgenic effects at the level of the hair follicle. Oral minoxidil is often used off-label at low doses for both men and women. These products do carry risks of side effects, so it’s important to consult a dermatologist you trust before deciding what’s right for you,” explains Dr. Brockman-Bitterman. But overall, she emphasizes that you can’t take a “one-size-fits-all” approach to treating hair loss or thinning. “Other causes of hair loss like inflammatory conditions or metabolic issues need to be ruled out before treatment is initiated,” she adds.
